title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: Currently, when a new file is created on a Windows workstation, it does not have Unix line delimiters.
EB: Even if the new file is created on Windows, it should have Unix line delimiters since the end product is a Unix product. There should be a UI in the Workbench Preferences to define the line delimiter for new files. Possible values for line delimiters are: Dos / Windows, Mac, Unix, and default platform line delimiter. The UI should be provided by the Workbench since all plugins should use the same line delimiter for new files.
SR: To reproduce the issue, consider the following scenario: Use both Unix and Windows workstations to develop a Unix product / program.
